title: 5 Pairs Natural Bamboo Reusable Chopsticks with Gift Box, Non-slip Chopstick Gift Set for Sushi Rice Noodles, Chinese Japanese Tableware Dishwasher Safe, 8.86 Inches/22.5 cm, Ice Crack
descriptions:
Easy-to-use, safe, and beautiful chopsticks for everyday meals.

What you get:
- 5 pairs of reusable chopsticks in a lovely gift box.
- Made from natural bamboo. No paint, no wax, and BPA-free.

Why they’re easy and comfortable:
- Light in the hand, yet sturdy.
- Non-slip tips help pick up food without dropping.
- Standard length: 8.86 inches (about 22.5 cm), easy to handle.

Safe and simple care:
- Dishwasher safe.
- Water resistant and won’t rust.
- Smooth surface that’s gentle on the mouth and easy to clean.

Designed to be helpful:
- The “Ice Crack” pattern gives a better grip and an elegant look.
- Inspired by traditional Japanese style.
- Good for rice, noodles, sushi, dumplings, and more.

Good for many places and people:
- Use at home, in the office, or in restaurants and hotels.
- A thoughtful gift for anyone who enjoys Asian food.

Why choose bamboo:
- Natural and eco-friendly.
- Strong and dense, but not heavy.
- Does not swell in water and stays looking nice.

In short: These bamboo chopsticks are light, safe, easy to hold, and easy to wash. They look elegant and come ready to gift. A simple, reliable choice for daily meals.
